definition: to avoid/to shun/to flee/to escape/to keep away from/to leave/to hide from

pinyin: zi3 gong1 nei4 bi4 yun4 qi4

sentences.english: Studies clearly show that rifampin decreases the effectiveness of birth control pills in preventing ovulation.
sentences.chinese: 研究清楚顯示，利福平會降低避孕藥抑制排卵的效力。

sentences.english: These were the first spermicides on condoms.18
sentences.chinese: 並且在避孕套中首次用了殺精藥。

sentences.english: Will the first to use contraceptives, "Yasmin", can reduce the dose of their own?
sentences.chinese: 請問初次用避孕藥“優思明”，可否自行減小劑量？

sentences.english: Does urgent prophylactic lose mufti action?
sentences.chinese: 常服緊急避孕藥有沒有負作用？

sentences.english: A form of contraception is therefore advisable, but a simple condom will be ineffective.
sentences.chinese: 因此避孕是明智的，但是簡單的避孕套會無效。

sentences.english: A form of contraception is therefore advisable, but a simple condom will be ineffective.
sentences.chinese: 因此避孕是明智的，但是簡單的避孕套會無效。

sentences.english: Contraceptive suppositories are recommended by doctors, as they are easy to use.
sentences.chinese: 建議用避孕栓來避孕，因爲它用法簡單。

sentences.english: Contraceptive suppositories are recommended by doctors, as they are easy to use.
sentences.chinese: 建議用避孕栓來避孕，因爲它用法簡單。

sentences.english: Under-16s would usually need a prescription to prevent a possible pregnancy in this way.
sentences.chinese: 16歲以下的少女通常需要藥方，纔可以以此避孕。

sentences.english: Birth control pill could put women off macho men.
sentences.chinese: 避孕藥可能會使女人對大男人失去性趣。

sentences.english: The condom is the glass slipper of our generation.
sentences.chinese: 避孕套是我們這代的水晶鞋。

sentences.english: When to use a female condom?
Condoms made out of animal intestines began to be available.
sentences.chinese: 由動物小腸製造的避孕套開始被使用。

sentences.english: To increase the effectiveness, a woman should insert the female condom before going into the water.
sentences.chinese: 爲了提高有效性，女用避孕套在入水前就應該插入。

sentences.english: Oral contraceptives work by reducing androgens .
sentences.chinese: 口服避孕藥，會減少雄性激素。

sentences.english: I've not discouraged my daughter from going on the pill now that she's reached the age of discretion .
sentences.chinese: 我女兒已到達解事責任年齡，我不再勸阻她服避孕藥。

definition: (of a married couple) to have intercourse/(literary) to share the same room/of the same family branch
safe period/safe days of a woman's menstrual cycle (low risk of conception)
euphemism for sexual intercourse/to go to bed with sb
